title: Code export input
description: Generate framework-specific code from a validated UiSchema.

schema.description: A validated UiSchema tree to generate code from.

framework.description: Target framework for code generation. HTML delegates to existing repl.render document mode.

styling.description: Styling strategy: inline style objects or design-token CSS variables.
